title: Football legend Kevin Keegan diagnosed with cancer, family says
description: Keegan is closely associated with the Premier League teams Liverpool and Newcastle, the latter he both played for and managed, twice, and is affectionately known as 'King Kev' for his footballing exploits.
content:
Football legend Kevin Keegan has been diagnosed with cancer, his family has said.
The former England forward and manager, 74, was recently admitted to hospital due to "ongoing abdominal symptoms", a statement said.

title: Keir Starmer urged to rethink business rate reform to save pubs
description: Some Labour MPs are optimistic there could be further relief to protect the hospitality industry.
content:
Labour MPs are calling on Sir Keir Starmer to rethink planned changes to business rates to protect pubs and other hospitality businesses.
The pub industry is warning of widespread closures when Covid-era business rate relief comes to an end in April.... [3071 chars]

title: Martin Chivers: Former Spurs and England forward dies aged 80
description: Former Tottenham and England forward Martin Chivers dies at the age of 80.
content:
Former Tottenham and England forward Martin Chivers has died at the age of 80.
During his eight years in north London, the striker scored 174 goals in 367 outings to help the club win the League Cup twice, as well as the Uefa Cup.
He also scored 13 g... [931 chars]

title: Berlin outage highlights German vulnerability to sabotage
description: The power cut was caused by a suspected arson attack and came as temperatures dipped below freezing.
content:
Power is being restored to the last homes hit by a five-day blackout in Germany's snow-covered capital, Berlin.
The outage was caused by a suspected arson attack and came as temperatures dipped below freezing.
It is reportedly the longest blackout in... [3053 chars]
